Package de.stocker.common

Interface IMainController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainController
    public interface IMainController
    The Interface IMainController is implemented by the main controller of the stocker program and allows the separate functional units to communicate with each other according to the mediator pattern.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addToMainFrame​(javax.swing.JInternalFrame iFrame)
      Adds an internal frame to the desktop pane of the main frame.
      javax.swing.JInternalFrame[] getIFrames()
      Gets all internal frames currently added to the main frame, used for saving the current state of the application
      PreferencesModel getPreferences()
      Gets the current preferences model with all currently active preferences.
      IStockerModel getStockerModel()
      Gets the current data base model.
      void notifyFramesOfMinSize()
      Notifies all frames of new minimum sizes after preferences have been set.
      void openChartFrame​(java.lang.String stockId)
      Opens a new chart frame for a specified stock.
      void openPreferencesFrame()
      Opens the preferences frame.
      void openSearchFrame()
      Opens the search frame.
      void openWatchlistFrame()
      Opens the watchlist frame.
      void resetApplication()
      Resets the application: clears all frames from the desktop pane and resets the data model to an empty state.
      void savePersistence()
      Saves all persistence information to file.
      void saveWatchlistLocation​(int x, int y)
      Saves the last position of the watchlist frame to restore the watchlist to that position after re-opening the frame.
      void updateDataProvider​(DataProvider dataProvider)
      Updates data provider after a preferences change.

      • saveWatchlistLocation

        void saveWatchlistLocation​(int x,
                           int y)
        Saves the last position of the watchlist frame to restore the watchlist to that position after re-opening the frame.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate

      • resetApplication

        void resetApplication()
        Resets the application: clears all frames from the desktop pane and resets the data model to an empty state. Preference changes are preserved and can be reset separately.
